title: MANSION --- Private Properties: Lawyer Sells Home In Bridgehampton
text:
Located on Sagaponack Pond, the main house is located on approximately 4 acres with an adjacent, roughly 1-acre buildable lot.

Christopher Covert of Compass and Hedgerow Exclusive Properties brokered the deal.

The deal is the latest in a string of pricey Hamptons home sales.A roughly 4-acre Sagaponack estate that belonged to the late Johnson & Johnson chief executive James Burke recently sold for $46.5 million, records show.

A roughly 2.6-acre estate on the ocean in Southampton recently listed for $44.995 million.
